TopicTitle: Where to download the KSP sound track?

Articles.Content:
As per title. No youtube please. Need the .mp3 format.

Thanks !
Alot of the music is stuff by Kevin MacLeod, I don't now the specific track names though.
Not sure if the music is for download. Also I seem to remember that the music is made by someone in the team and not by Kevin MacLeod. Correct me if I'm wrong.
The music is mostly kevin macleod and some is copyright of squad
